LanguageData.Make_Armor_Ferian.label: Make the Seeker-Suit
LanguageData.Make_Armor_Ferian.description: Make the Seeker-Helmet and the Seeker-Armor together, all the raw materials are used 100% of the time.
LanguageData.Make_Armor_H_Repair.label: Add a 【Psychic Dampener】 to the Seeker-Helmet
LanguageData.Make_Armor_H_Repair.description: Repair and add a 【Psychic Dampener】 to the Seeker-Helmet. all the raw materials are used 100% of the time.
LanguageData.Make_Armor_T_Repair.label: Repair the Seeker-Armor
LanguageData.Make_Armor_T_Repair.description: Repair the Seeker Armor. all the raw materials are used 100% of the time.
